llm.feedback: Revise the four items so each line is a single sentence, maps mortgage rates to the canonical `ust10y` handle with explicit magnitude, and cites the catalyst source. For each entry: 1) list the exact window (e.g., 2025‑10‑15 – 2026‑03‑31 for the Fed meeting); 2) in the driver/mechanism field write the causal chain and magnitude, e.g., “Fed rate hike (U21K4ALYQ) raises ust10y +10‑20bp, lifting mortgage rates”; 3) in the watch field name the specific catalyst (e.g., “Fed minutes for hike signal (U21K4ALYQ)”). 4) give a probability % and cite the source if available (Fed cut 70 % (U21K4ALYQ), Fed hike 30 % (U21K4ALYQ), CPI >3.5 % 25 % (3YAQ8JUPL), CPI <3.5 % 25 % (3YAQ8JUPL)). Ensure each line ends with the probability and no extra text. Remove the current draft lines that reference ust10y alone and replace them with the updated mortgage‑rate‑focused entries.
